localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: A powerful website builder built on an open source CMS, offering in-context live editing and dynamic visual design tools with multisite enablement. An extensible and modular system in a full stack JS environment ready for traditional or headless deployment.
nodes.title: Apostrophe 3.0 - A powerful website builder built on an open source CMS
nodes.author: Alex Gilbert

nodes.excerpt: Talscale is a one-stop platform to assess tech talent for hiring remotely. Evaluate candidates with project-based assessments, & live pair-programming interviews to building a data-driven hiring process with a suite of collaboration-friendly tools.
nodes.title: Talscale - Remote interviewing suite and AI-powered assessment platform
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Tachyon is a developer-first API, that makes big data transfer a breeze. For example we help life sciences companies move around terabytes of sequencing information in a fast, secure painless way.
nodes.title: Tachyon - APIs for fast big data transfer, move files in â‰¤ 5 lines
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: With Deploy Now from IONOS, you can git push your static website or web project from GitHub directly without any build or bandwidth restrictions. Staging, SSL and georedundant, DDoS-protected infrastructure are included in the free plan.
nodes.title: Deploy Now - Git push your web project and go live instantly
nodes.author: Robert Schleinhege

nodes.excerpt: hotglue is the simplest way to build native SaaS integrations that scale, without sacrificing the extensibility developers need to add real value for their users. Schedule a chat with the hotglue team to talk about getting started today!
nodes.title: hotglue - Offer native user-facing SaaS integrations to your customers

nodes.excerpt: Evolve is a simple cash back app that helps you earn cash back automatically from your day to day spending with your debit card. With Evolve, every spending from your debit card can earn you automatic cash back. Evolve also offers exclusive cash back offers.
nodes.title: Evolve - Connect your card and earn up to 15% automatic cash back
nodes.author: George Pu

nodes.excerpt: Quod AI's Chrome extension helps software developers resolve issues smarter. See instant search suggestions for code and more from your Github or Jira issues. Powered by AI.
nodes.title: Quod AI for Github & Jira issues - 1-click search for code & context from Github/Jira issues
nodes.author: Ravi Sethia

nodes.excerpt: If you're stuck with performance issues in your app, this Code Audit offering will help you detect most issues. It's 2-in-1 deal: in-depth Code Review services, bundled with a free Notion checklist to analyze your project, if you work with a dev agency.
nodes.title: Code Audit + Free Checklist - Robust tech package to detect critical issues in your app
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Recast by Amplication is an open-source tool that generates TypeScript Node.js backend and a React client based on Excel schema. It includes a GraphQL and REST API, identity management, logging utility, error handler, and a React admin UI.
nodes.title: Recast by Amplication - Convert Excel Sheet to a TypeScript Node.js API
nodes.author: Yuval Hazaz

nodes.excerpt: The Meeshkan Chrome extension enables no-code test writing for any webapp, so that anyone can write a test case in seconds. Spend less time writing tests, more time creating brilliant products, and feel confident that every merge will delight your users.
nodes.title: Meeshkan Recorder - The fastest way to write & manage UI tests

nodes.excerpt: Beta Console is a live list of every developer tool and beta early access release. We include the 2-3 most interesting in our weekly developer tools newsletter, but with 100+ active programs at any given time, this is the list of everything, updated daily.

nodes.excerpt: Exploring your code is getting tougher every day. Thundra Sidekick provides a pro toolset for Application Debugging. Sidekick helps developers debug any application such as microservices with distributed architectures hosted on the cloud or on-premises.
nodes.title: Thundra Sidekick - Trace and Debug microservices remotely for $0
nodes.author: Mert Aktas
